words.source: H6213 (asah: to do/make); KJV: 'let them make', ESV: 'let them make', NASB: 'let them construct'
(pronominal suffix); KJV: 'me', ESV: 'for me', NASB: 'for Me'
H4720 (miqdash: sacred place); KJV: 'sanctuary', ESV: 'sanctuary', NASB: 'sanctuary'
H7931 (shakan: to dwell/abide); KJV: 'that I may dwell', ESV: 'that I may dwell', NASB: 'that I may dwell'
H8432 (tavek: midst); KJV: 'among them', ESV: 'among them', NASB: 'among them'
